title: [BRS] Enable Event-Driven Accounting (AP/AR + General Ledger)
body:
/kiro
# Business Requirement

## Classification (confirm labels)
- Type: epic
- Layer: domain
- Domain: accounting

## Epic
[EPIC] Enable Event-Driven Accounting (AP/AR + General Ledger)

## Outcome
Accounting ingests standardized accounting events emitted by other modules (Workorder, Inventory, Purchasing, etc.), translates them into balanced journal entries, posts them to the General Ledger (GL) using the correct category/accounts/dimensions, and supports operational AP/AR workflows with period controls and auditability.

## Non-negotiables
- Event-driven ingestion with deterministic mapping from event -> posting categories/accounts/dimensions
- Idempotency and deduplication (replays must not duplicate GL impact)
- Balanced postings only (sum debits == sum credits)
- Full traceability from GL lines back to source event and originating business document
- Policy-driven handling of unmapped events (reject or suspense queue)
